content: HelloBitcointalk community member and Bitcoin art collector BTC “They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.”Image update! number 6/12.OLD:Bid Format: SALE if the price ticker is not loading then update the link  + (US approx. 80-125$ Shipping ) + (EU 40$ Shipping^^^^^^^^^^^^ approx. 550$Payment address: 3MPHyUFCrmMahgSXN4hYEqQT5sLobqXkRE^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^1. - SOLD2. - SOLD at London Domain summit 3. - SOLD  At the Bitcoin Conference in Travemunde, Germany4. - SOLD (BitF?!)5. - SOLD Sold in Germany at a small citadel,it will be visible in the Bitcoin restaurant Radi's Stacks in Trier.(Loadable: 16dz1gWR8px7Rsd3HjN9nh41UETByhUmnH)https://opendime.com/balance/16dz1gWR8px7Rsd3HjN9nh41UETByhUmnH6. - SOLD  @ London Domain summit 20247. - RESERVED @ (location: STOCKHOLM, SWEDEN)8. --9. --10. --11. - SOLD12. --^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^“BITCOIN HUMANITY!” FRAMED PRINT/POSTERLimited Edition of 12Technique: Digital art with mixed mediaPoster with Black grained wooden frame in size 63,4 x 63,4 cm/poster size 60 x 60 cm Hahnemühle Print© – Paper „Made in Germany“ since 1584^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Each Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.Levins and includes certificate of authenticitytimestamped on $BTC blockchain via Verisart.———————Payment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer———————Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Number 2 of 12 SOLD for 550$ at London Domain Summit BTCAugmented Reality layer coming very soon!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: This artwork was one of my first pieces, you know, conveying the message that everyone is a Bitcoiner  Of course, except Craig Wright.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone,This is one of my very first artworks and a favorite among bitcoiners. Every time I attend an event or conference, I bring one piece with me, and it always gets sold right there on the spot. Another number SOLD: 3/12 is gone, and 5/12 is reserved.This artwork now includes an AR layer. You can see the animation by opening the Artivive app and scanning the piece. This design will also be featured on clothes and postcards, soon! It’s a really special one, and I’m incredibly happy with it.I would love to collaborate with one of the collectors to create a unique frame, maybe something vintage with museum glass. If you’re interested, let me know! Thank you for the amazing support!I’m also open to suggestions and ideas, so please share your thoughts. This artwork speaks to each of us on an emotional level, including everyone in its story.Thank you again for your incredible support!With love,Mx12Art

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I have added new images of number 6/12.This piece is going to London for the Domain Summit 2024 on August 20-21, where I will have a private exhibition and share the orange pill experience ). This is one of my favorites, if you take a photo from the front, your face won't be visible, only your body, giving you the feeling of being Satoshi Nakamoto. I created it for this reason. Fun fact - this artwork marks the beginning of mx12Art and has been my avatar from the start, serving as my logo.Oh, and number 5/12 SOLD at a small citadel in Germany and will be displayed publicly soon!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Artwork number 6/12 has SOLD! And stays in LONDON! Congratulations!The collector is a very interesting person who appreciates our movement, thinks differently, and values quality. Check out the twitter and instagram of "BezelsNFT" BTC Thanks! Let me know what you think!Could you please help me find all the threads related to Bitcoin watches and groups interested in creating Bitcoin watches? I plan to invite him to create a thread here, but I need help locating those Bitcoin watch threads first. Thanks!AR ANIMATION via ARTIVIVE APP:https://streamable.com/7h76mb

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hello! We’re nearing the finish line, and only 4 out of 12 artworks remain.Number 7 will be displayed in Stockholm, Sweden, more details soon! This is a huge move for him as a collector, and it’s an honor to build this connection with him. I’m proud of the relationship we’ve built, having such a strong connection with me, one of the earliest Bitcoin artists is truly special. Let’s keep pushing forward!Thank you for being part of this journey. Once all the pieces are sold, there’s even more coming! For collectors, an Augmented Reality update will be released, the original animation will remain, but a second, longer animation with more details will be added. I’m here to stay and keep building There’s big news on the way, and I’m giving it my all to take this to the next level. With all the connections I’ve built in London, I’m ready to bring this art to new heights!  BTC
